info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 1 at 11:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...
White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County.
For the Lower White River...including Des Arc...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Des Arc.
* WHEN...From Sunday, April 13 until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 24 feet April 13. Additional rainfall is in the forecast over the weekend. Continue to monitor latest forecasts for updates. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 72 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts.
Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk
Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1145 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY, APRIL 13 UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
